PrimaryPrelims.Title: Financial Services and Markets Act 2023
PrimaryPrelims.LongTitle: An Act to make provision about the regulation of financial services and markets; and for connected purposes.

Para.Text: Be it enacted by the Kings most Excellent Majesty, by and with the advice and consent of the Lords Spiritual and Temporal, and Commons, in this present Parliament assembled, and by the authority of the same, as follows:
